forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the dawn begins to stretch its light across Downtown San Francisco, the city finds itself wrapped in a gentle layer of clouds. The early hour carries a hint of briskness, with temperatures resting in the low fifties—a reminder to anyone emerging from the warmth of home to don a light jacket or sweater. The winds from the west whisper quietly, hinting at a day that will unfurl towards a brighter disposition. 

By midday, the sun will reclaim the stage, ushering in a pleasant high near sixty-five degrees. A warming trend is expected, though the afternoon may cool slightly, so layers will serve you well as you venture outdoors. With the promise of mostly clear skies, today is ripe for simple pleasures. Perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where one can soak in the views of the bay, or a quiet moment with a book in a sun-drenched park—perfect simplicity in the embrace of urban life. The coastal winds may lend a brisk touch, so a windbreaker could be advisable for those more sensitive to the chill that can peek through even the sunniest of moments. 

Overall, today embodies the delicate dance of fog and sun that defines this splendid city, a day that speaks gently of contentment for those who cherish its character.
